ComicInfo.Summary:
Featuring the stories:
"To Master a Mummy!" written by Scott Edelman, penciled by Charles Nicholas, inked by Romeo Tanghal, lettered by Jean Simek and colored by Jerry Serpe. "Daily Planet" Volume 78 issue 26 for the week of July 10, 1978 written by Bob Rozakis and production by Anthony Tollin. "The Smartest Plant in the World!" written by Arnold Drake, penciled and inked by Rubeny and colored by Jerry Serpe. "A Piece of the Sky" written by Bob Toomey, penciled and inked by Tom Sutton, lettered by Shelly Leferman and colored by Jerry Serpe. "The Knight in a Gilded Cage!" written by Scott Edelman, penciled and inked by Jose Luis Garcia Lopez, lettered by Todd Klein and colored by Jerry Serpe. *Notes:* This was the final issue in the series; House of Secrets was cancelled abruptly after this issue in the company-wide cancellation which has come to be known as the DC Implosion. This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Batman, Robin and Commissioner Gordon and the "Corsair of Crime". A letter to the editor from Kevin J, Dooley of Glendale, CA.
